title: Pope appoints new cardinals to cement legacy
text:
Pope appoints new cardinals to cement legacy 8:37pm IST - 01:02
Pope Francis said on Sunday he would elevate 14 churchmen from five continents to the rank of cardinal, picking candidates that work with the poor or where Catholics are in a minority and putting his stamp on the group that will elect his successor. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Pope Francis said on Sunday he would elevate 14 churchmen from five continents to the rank of cardinal, picking candidates that work with the poor or where Catholics are in a minority and putting his stamp on the group that will elect his successor.
